description: This file provides utility functions to control motion preferences at runtime, including enabling, disabling, and checking for reduced motion, by setting or removing a document attribute and considering user OS preferences.

methods.name: enableReducedMotion
methods.description: Sets a document attribute to disable non-essential motion, respecting OS preferences.

methods.name: disableReducedMotion
methods.description: Removes the document attribute to enable motion, respecting OS preferences.

methods.name: isReduced
methods.description: Checks if reduced motion is requested either via document attribute or OS preference.
